title: p3  Adc Main Lf  Duo Partner/ a Coach to help achieve Diamond
body:
Ign: SuperSandLesbian
Main adc, can all roles 
Main Vayne And Lucian, and  Currently learning Draven and Kalista
Would like to find someone to help me get Diamond, but would like to learn a few things along the way.
Add me if your interested in Duo or interested in teaching me. C:
I am a Frequent player, and can take Criticism, i can also Get any Software needed for Communication.

replies.body: learn graves corki jinyx cause there god tier adc atm
I can play corki and Graves, how ever those adc's listed up there are my confident adc's, but thank you, i will work on it
